item.title: Projects
item.description:
Science Hold
Technology asteres [Repo] An extension to include tag management for starred GitHub repositories by representing them as repo issues. Syncing is done with a Github Action working and a Heroku Flask endpoint. cantor [Site] A website to follow GitHub organizations. Users are notified whenever new repositories are created. The front end uses a no code platform called Bubble to take care of user and database management. The back end uses Python for processing data, updating data, and sending emails.
